name: Unhinged Maw Kiss
descrip: Deeply kiss your opponent. Can charm them.
outcome: {AttackerName}'s tongue softly enters {TargetName}'s mouth, lovingly intertwining with {TargetHisOrHer} tongue while {AttackerHisOrHer} larger body is pressed tightly against {TargetName}!
miss: {AttackerName}'s tongue softly enters {TargetName}'s mouth, lovingly intertwining with {TargetHisOrHer} tongue while {AttackerHisOrHer} larger body is pressed tightly against {TargetName}, but {TargetName} manages to endure {AttackerHisOrHer} romantic kiss!
statusOutcome: {TargetName}'s mind fogs up from the sexual affection! {TargetName} is charmed!
